name: bspmview
tagline: MATLAB program for viewing 3D fMRI statistical images generated by SPM
body:
### About BSPMVIEW
This is in progress documentation for using BSPMVIEW.
 
### Installation
Once you've downloaded the software, add the root folder to your MATLAB path.  

### Starting


```
>> bspmview('spmT_0001.img', 'T1.nii')   % overlay on 'T1.nii'
>> bspmview('spmT_0001.img')   % overlay on default underlay
>> bspmview                    % open dialogue for selecting overlay
>> S = bspmview;     % returns struct 'S' containing GUI obj handles
```
